price: A rãnar da ake musanya ƙasa* bã ƙasar nan ba, da sammai kuma su bayyana ga Allah Makaɗaici, Mai tanƙwasãwa.
arabic: يَوۡمَ تُبَدَّلُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ غَيۡرَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتُۖ وَبَرَزُواْ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡوَٰحِدِ ٱلۡقَهَّارِ
footnotes: * A Rãnar Ƙiyãma Allah zai musanyã ƙasa da sama a kãwo waɗansu a lõkacin da mutãne suke a kan Sirãɗi kamar yadda ya zo a Hadisi.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yawma tubaddalu al-arḍu ghayra al-arḍi wal-samāwātu wabarazū lillahi al-wāḥidi al-qahāri
